issue.title: Ign msgs2 cannot find Protobuf on Ubuntu Xenial

content.raw:
Which version of protobuf are you trying to use? I remember now that the protobuf imported targets don't get created in older versions of protobuf.

I suppose we need to tweak the verification to look at the library variable instead of the imported target on older versions of protobuf.
